sentences: On Friday, 16 June, the SBI/SBSTA adopted draft conclusions by the Chair (FCCC/SB/2000/CRP.4) forwarding the 'consolidated text on principles, modalities, rules and guidelines,' to SB-13 as a basis for further negotiations on the Protocol mechanisms, with a view to a decision at COP-6.
enb_long_title: TWELFTH SESSION OF THE SUBSIDIARY BODIES OF THE UNFCCC
